Class ServerOutputStream

                  org.akubraproject.rmi.server.ServerOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Serializable, Remote, Unreferenced, RemoteOutputStream
public class ServerOutputStream
extends UnicastExportable
implements RemoteOutputStream, Closeable

Server side implementation of a RemoteOutputStream.

Author:
Pradeep Krishnan
